description: This resource is used to describe an instance of a device at a location.

id.description: Unique identifier on location level in the source system for this device.

serial.description: Optionally, the serial number of the device.

name.description: Name given to the device by the farmer.

description.description: Description of the device by the farmer.

softwareVersion.description: Version of the software installed on the device.

hardwareVersion.description: Version of the hardware installed in the device.

isActive.description: Indicates whether the device is active at this moment.

supportedMessages.description: Identifies message types supported for the device

manufacturer.description: The device data as defined by the manufacturer.
